channel.title: Setting up server to Lan
channel.description: ok i got a 562 and i go to the client and got to client.java and edit the ip thingy from 127.0.0.1 to my lan ip 192.168.10.106 ok. so then i do build and it does its thing then i run and it stays on connecting to update server Help me! HELP ME!!!!!
